common.error: Coś poszło nie tak. Spróbuj ponownie.

todaysPlan.title: Plan na dziś

help.title: Potrzebuję pomocy

help.helpSent: Twoja rodzina została powiadomiona. Pomoc jest w drodze.

sos.label: SOS

locationTracking.title: Udostępnić swoją lokalizację?

activities.title: Gry umysłowe

common.thankYouSharing: Dziękujemy za podzielenie się swoimi myślami!

wordAssociation.title: Skojarzenia słowne
wordAssociation.description: Powiedz pierwsze słowo, które przychodzi Ci na myśl
wordAssociation.instruction: Spójrz na słowo poniżej. Jakie jest pierwsze słowo, które przychodzi Ci na myśl?
wordAssociation.sayWord: Powiedz słowo na głos lub pomyśl o nim w głowie. Nie spiesz się!

gentleQuiz.title: Delikatny Quiz
gentleQuiz.goodGuess: Dobry strzał! Odpowiedź to właściwie {{answer}}. Czyż to nie ciekawe?

q.afterWinter: Jaka pora roku następuje po zimie?

q.largestOcean: Jaki jest największy ocean na świecie?
q.sky: Jakiego koloru jest niebo w pogodny dzień?

wordSearch.title: Wykreślanka

wordScramble.title: Rozsypanka
wordScramble.instruction: Dotknij liter we właściwej kolejności, aby przeliterować słowo

oddOneOut.instruction: Dotknij tego, które nie pasuje do pozostałych

nameThatTune.title: Name That Tune
nameThatTune.description: Guess the song from a few lines
nameThatTune.instruction: Can you name this well-known song?

sortItOut.description: Put things in the right place
sortItOut.instruction: Tap an item, then tap where it belongs

thisDayInHistory.title: This Day in History
thisDayInHistory.description: Discover what happened in the past
thisDayInHistory.instruction: Here is something that happened this month

discuss.royals: Do you remember the Royal Family in those days?
discuss.changes: How have things changed since then?
discuss.firstTV: Do you remember when television first came along?
discuss.technology: What inventions have surprised you most?
discuss.weather: Do you remember any big storms or cold winters?
discuss.coldWinter: What did you do to keep warm?
discuss.leaders: Who were the leaders you admired?
discuss.wartime: What do you remember about those times?
discuss.space: What did you think about space travel?

discuss.music: What was your favourite music then?

discuss.justice: What makes the world a fairer place?
discuss.competition: Have you ever watched the Olympics?
discuss.firstPhone: Do you remember the first telephone you used?
discuss.courage: Who do you think showed great courage?

whatWouldYouChoose.title: What Would You Choose?
whatWouldYouChoose.description: Pick your favourite — there is no wrong answer

followUps.hotDrink: A lovely hot drink always hits the spot. Tell someone about your choice!
followUps.holiday: Wonderful! What is your favourite holiday memory?
followUps.pet: Both are wonderful companions. Have you had a pet?
followUps.season: Every season has something special. What do you enjoy about it?
followUps.kitchen: The kitchen is full of lovely memories. What do you like to make?
followUps.timeOfDay: We all have our favourite time. What makes it special for you?
followUps.entertainment: There is nothing like a good story. What is your favourite?
followUps.place: Both are lovely in their own way. Where would you go?
followUps.sound: Sometimes we need one, sometimes the other. Tell someone about it!
followUps.treat: A lovely choice! What would go perfectly with it?
followUps.travel: Getting out and about is wonderful. Where do you like to go?
followUps.weather: There is beauty in every kind of weather. What do you enjoy?
followUps.snack: A tasty pick! What is your all-time favourite snack?
followUps.perform: Music and movement lift the spirits! Do you have a favourite song?
followUps.mild: Both are beautiful seasons. What do you look forward to?
followUps.relax: Nothing like a good soak or freshen up! What helps you relax?
followUps.fruit: Both are delicious. What other fruits do you enjoy?
followUps.dinner: A good meal brings people together. Tell someone about your choice!
followUps.clothes: However you dress, the important thing is feeling good!
followUps.morningRoutine: Everyone has their own rhythm. What is your favourite morning routine?

myFavourites.title: My Favourites
myFavourites.description: Share your favourite things — no wrong answers
myFavourites.instruction: Think about your answer, then share it with someone nearby

followUps.sweetTreat: Everyone deserves a sweet treat now and then!
followUps.instrument: Music fills the soul! Can you play one?

followUps.achievement: You should be proud! Share it with someone.
followUps.bedtime: A good night routine helps us sleep well!
followUps.morningRitual: A lovely way to start the day!
followUps.happiness: What a beautiful answer. Hold onto that feeling!
followUps.smell: Scents bring back the most wonderful memories!
followUps.sound: What a lovely sound to enjoy!
followUps.sight: How beautiful! Tell someone about it.

rememberWhen.title: Remember When
rememberWhen.instruction: Look at these items and share your memories

questions.radioListening: Did your family gather around the radio? What did you listen to?
questions.washDay: What was wash day like? Was it a big job?
questions.powerCuts: Do you remember any power cuts or candle-lit evenings?
questions.milkBottles: Do you remember the milkman delivering bottles to your door?
questions.bakingDay: Was there a special baking day in your home?
questions.kitchenSmells: What are the best kitchen smells you remember?
questions.firstTV: Do you remember when your family got their first television?
questions.cinema: What was it like going to the cinema?
questions.variety: Do you remember watching variety shows?
questions.vinylRecords: Did you have a record player? What records did you play?

questions.danceHall: Did you ever go to a dance hall? What was it like?

questions.bestOutfit: What was the best outfit you ever wore?

questions.doubleDeckerBus: Do you remember riding a double-decker bus?

questions.trainJourney: What was a train journey like?
questions.bestPresent: What was the best Christmas present you received?
questions.sundayRoast: Do you remember the Sunday roast?
questions.favouriteSweet: What was your favourite sweet as a child?

questions.saturdayTV: What did you watch on Saturday night television?

questions.workFriends: Did you make good friends at work?
questions.proudMoment: What is a proud moment from your working life?
